alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 4:09AM PST until January 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Kittitas Valley and Yakima Valley. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will begin by Sunday evening and gradually become heavier overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
